body:
Okay so there’s this one person in out friend group that like everyone hates, and three of us sent something like taunting her cause she’s basically a hoe, and she said

“But like seriously I leave for 2 days and i come back to being talked about and getting made fun of” and “Only one question y do u guys hate me” (btw directly copy and pasted) and I’m just tempted to send this

title: A Thousand Times More
body:
by persikaaan

Having Min Yoongi, your friend since kindergarten, turn from the sweet boy next door to someone the Devil would be proud to call ‘son’ was devestating. But things got a lot worse when he suddenly said he had feelings for you.

summary: {SHOOK} BTS Purchase their own OUTFITS instead of getting Sponsorship from Clothing Companies This is a surprise and yet not....
caption:
{SHOOK} BTS Purchase their own OUTFITS instead of getting Sponsorship from Clothing Companies

This is a surprise and yet not. Also, just as I was wondering if other idols may do something similar, even if with cheaper or more expensive clothing, my question was answered.﻿

This all leads back to my thoughts about their stylists and hair & makeup though. Those women (assuming gender since it usually women) are amazing. From day 0, they have been doing an amazing job styling 7 guys with different body types, skin tones and preferences really well. And in such a way that you can still see a group cohesiveness. I’ve never looked at BTS and thought one of the members was dressed as less than the others. Or like the stylists didn’t know what to do with their body. Which is amazing considering how different each of them are body shape and face-wise.

Of course, every kpop group stylist has this issue and nobody is perfect. But even after years, some don’t seem to even try (looking at you Suju and SNSD stylists). Though I am aware they get paid shitty wages so maybe its that. Who knows? Anyway, BTS stylists focusing on making RM look more mature as a leader even though he’s not the oldest by keeping his hair pushed back off his forehead most of the time is great strategy. Styling Jimin and Suga in clothes that sort of fill in their smaller statures so they don’t look tiny next to the others (Neither man is all that short honestly its the thinness that’s the biggest difference). Somehow keeping Kookie looking boyish because of his age and yet mature enough you don’t notice an age gap. Dealing with Jin’s shoulders and lack of booty all these year. That takes some serious work. Seriously, not joking on that. And so much more. 

Every comeback they all look good and comfortable (except maybe the shorts in I Need U where there were a few moments a couple of them *coughyoongicough* didn’t look comfy in those shorts) in clothing, makeup and hairstyles that suit each individually. Highlighting their best qualities and masking some not so great ones. Case in point, J-hope is rockin the SHIT out of the emo-rock look for Fake Love. Every outfit is highlighting how well it suits him as a style. And who would have thought? But everyone else looks great too.So yeah, shout out to BTS stylists.

summary: Namjoon, Taehyung and Jungkook - You burn your hand late at night You stretch your hands above your head with a groan as you...
body:
Namjoon, Taehyung and Jungkook - You burn your hand late at night

You stretch your hands above your head with a groan as you wait for the kettle to boil. You’re working on a paper for your degree, and it’s a little past midnight but you’re on a roll so you don’t want to stop. When the kettle is finally boiled, you pick it up to pour yourself a cup of tea, but all at once there’s a loud bang outside from some fireworks outside, you jump in shock, your hand slips and the kettle falls, pouring boiling water all over your hand and arm. Screaming, your boyfriend wakes up in the next room and comes rushing in.

Namjoon

Still rubbing sleep out of his eyes, Namjoon’s ushering you into a taxi quite soon, your arm submerged in a bowl of cold water. He doesn’t know if doing that is going to help, but it can’t possibly make it worse. You’re meant to keep burns under cold running water, but he needs to get you to A&E so this is the next best thing,

“It’s okay, we’re going to the hospital, you’ll be okay,” Namjoon mumbles to you after talking rapidly to the taxi driver, asking him to hurry up. It’s times like that Namjoon really wishes he had a driving license, but then again he’d probably be more likely to crash. All he can do is sit by you and wipe your flowing tears, hoping that traffic is good at gone midnight.

Taehyung

“Put your arm under the tap! Right now, cold water, go!” Taehyung yells, snapping out of his tired state when he sees your arm, and how distressed you are. When your cries are slowing down, the cold water providing relief for you, Taehyung steps back and pushes a hand through his messy hair, trying to figure out what to do. As he thinks, you decide that it’s taking you too long,

“Tae, sweetheart, I need to go to the hospital. Could you go put some clothes on and drive me? Thank you,” You tell him as calmly as possible. Your voice is shaky and strained, but if you start yelling and panicking it will only rub off on Taehyung, so you speak as calmly as possible in the hope that it will help. It does.

Jungkook

Jungkook likes to think that he is cool and collected at all times. He likes to think that he’s great at everything and therefore knows what to do in every single situation. This is a lie. Although it’s true for the most part, Jungkook has no clue what to do when he gets put under this kind of pressure. When he sees you crying, he starts getting worked up, and is crying a little bit too while you try to calm him down,

“Kook! Jungkook! Look at me! I need you to take me to hospital, please stop freaking out,” You plead, and at the sound of the word ‘hospital’, Jungkook seems to sober up a bit, nodding as he wipes his eyes with the back of his hand. He grabs his car keys and offers to carry you, but you politely say no. Maybe if you keep being calm, Jungkook will follow suit.

Masterlist
body_abstract:
Namjoon, Taehyung and Jungkook - You burn your hand late at night

You stretch your hands above your head with a groan as you wait for the kettle to boil. You’re working on a paper for your degree, and it’s a little past midnight but you’re on a roll so you don’t want to stop. When the kettle is finally boiled, you pick it up to pour yourself a cup of tea, but all at once there’s a loud bang outside from some fireworks outside, you jump in shock, your hand slips and the kettle falls, pouring boiling water all over your hand and arm. Screaming, your boyfriend wakes up in the next room and comes rushing in.

reblog.comment:
Namjoon, Taehyung and Jungkook - You burn your hand late at night

You stretch your hands above your head with a groan as you wait for the kettle to boil. You’re working on a paper for your degree, and it’s a little past midnight but you’re on a roll so you don’t want to stop. When the kettle is finally boiled, you pick it up to pour yourself a cup of tea, but all at once there’s a loud bang outside from some fireworks outside, you jump in shock, your hand slips and the kettle falls, pouring boiling water all over your hand and arm. Screaming, your boyfriend wakes up in the next room and comes rushing in.

[[MORE]]

Namjoon

Still rubbing sleep out of his eyes, Namjoon’s ushering you into a taxi quite soon, your arm submerged in a bowl of cold water. He doesn’t know if doing that is going to help, but it can’t possibly make it worse. You’re meant to keep burns under cold running water, but he needs to get you to A&E so this is the next best thing,

“It’s okay, we’re going to the hospital, you’ll be okay,” Namjoon mumbles to you after talking rapidly to the taxi driver, asking him to hurry up. It’s times like that Namjoon really wishes he had a driving license, but then again he’d probably be more likely to crash. All he can do is sit by you and wipe your flowing tears, hoping that traffic is good at gone midnight.

Taehyung

“Put your arm under the tap! Right now, cold water, go!” Taehyung yells, snapping out of his tired state when he sees your arm, and how distressed you are. When your cries are slowing down, the cold water providing relief for you, Taehyung steps back and pushes a hand through his messy hair, trying to figure out what to do. As he thinks, you decide that it’s taking you too long,

“Tae, sweetheart, I need to go to the hospital. Could you go put some clothes on and drive me? Thank you,” You tell him as calmly as possible. Your voice is shaky and strained, but if you start yelling and panicking it will only rub off on Taehyung, so you speak as calmly as possible in the hope that it will help. It does.

Jungkook

Jungkook likes to think that he is cool and collected at all times. He likes to think that he’s great at everything and therefore knows what to do in every single situation. This is a lie. Although it’s true for the most part, Jungkook has no clue what to do when he gets put under this kind of pressure. When he sees you crying, he starts getting worked up, and is crying a little bit too while you try to calm him down,

“Kook! Jungkook! Look at me! I need you to take me to hospital, please stop freaking out,” You plead, and at the sound of the word ‘hospital’, Jungkook seems to sober up a bit, nodding as he wipes his eyes with the back of his hand. He grabs his car keys and offers to carry you, but you politely say no. Maybe if you keep being calm, Jungkook will follow suit.

Masterlist

title: MASTERLIST
body:
BTS


Headcanons:

Jungkook as your boyfriend

Taehyung as your boyfriend

Jimin as your boyfriend

Namjoon as your boyfriend

Hoseok as your boyfriend

Yoongi as your boyfriend

Seokjin as your boyfriend


Reactions: 

(oldest to newest)

BTS reacting to …

Their S/O being super ticklish

Seeing their S/O with glasses for the first time

Their S/O cuudling up to them in their sleep

Kissing their crush

Their S/O being insecure about their relationship

Both being insecure about their relationship

Their S/O being super innocent

Their S/O being addicted to tea

Their S/O being amazed by their new dorm

Playing with their dogs

Cute Interactions


Scenarios:
